CustomField.description: Returns Net ACV only for deals where BL Forecast Category is Commit. Uses Net ACV for existing customers, ACV for new business. Only positive values.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(BL_Forecast_Category__c, "Commit"), IF(Prior_Opp_ACV__c > 0, Renewal_Net_Change__c, ACV__c) > 0 ), IF(Prior_Opp_ACV__c > 0, Renewal_Net_Change__c, ACV__c), 0 )
CustomField.label: Quarterly Commit (Net New)
